description: Main entry point for a Flutter application setting up theme, routing, environment variables, providers, and app initialization.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Root widget of the Flutter application, responsible for initializing providers, themes, and routing.

classes.name: _MyAppState
classes.description: State class for MyApp, manages API client initialization and asynchronous provider setup.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Application entry point that initializes Flutter binding, loads environment variables, and runs the app.

methods.name: _initializeProviders
methods.description: Initializes various app state providers, such as auth, settings, games, and leaderboard, possibly involving async operations.
